<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CardCountLabelSkin" width="25" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  minWidth="25" minHeight="19">
	<e:Image id="img_bg" width="25" height="19" x="0" y="0" source="QunCardCountBG" fillMode="scale"/>
	<e:Label id="lb_cardCount" text="0" y="0" width="25" height="15" size="14" textAlign="center" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" horizontalCenter="0" verticalAlign="middle" bold="true"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="CardRendererSkin" minWidth="68" minHeight="82" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" height="82" width="68">
	<e:Group id="group" width="100%" height="100%" x="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image id="img_class" width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" fillMode="scale" source="{data.class}"/>
		<e:Image id="img_number" width="13" height="11" x="3" y="3" fillMode="scale" source="{data.number}" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
		<e:Image id="img_suit" width="13" height="11" x="3" y="13" source="{data.suit}" fillMode="scale"/>
		<e:Image id="img_dark" width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" source="Card_CannotUse_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillMode="scale" visible="{data.dark}"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.CheckBoxSkin" states="up,down,disabled,upAndSelected,downAndSelected,disabledAndSelected" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Group width="100%" height="100%">
        <e:layout>
            <e:HorizontalLayout verticalAlign="middle"/>
        </e:layout>
        <e:Image fillMode="scale" alpha="1" alpha.disabled="0.5" alpha.down="0.7"
                 source="checkbox_unselect_png"
                 source.upAndSelected="checkbox_select_up_png"
                 source.downAndSelected="checkbox_select_down_png"
                 source.disabledAndSelected="checkbox_select_disabled_png"/>
        <e:Label id="labelDisplay" size="20" textColor="0x707070"
                 textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle"
                 fontFamily="Tahoma"/>
    </e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameSidebarAreaSkin" width="194" height="491" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
	<e:Rect width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" fillAlpha="0.2"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="GameWindowSkin" width="400" height="300" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" minHeight="30" minWidth="30">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" source="WindowBG_png" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" scale9Grid="10,8,24,24"/>
	<e:Group height="20" left="5%" right="5%" top="6">
		<e:Image height="100%" source="WindowTitleBG_png" anchorOffsetX="0" alpha="0.05" x="0" y="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" width="100%"/>
		<e:Label id="lb_title" text="" x="0" y="0" width="100%" height="100%" size="15" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="Microsoft YaHei" textColor="0xe4d5a0"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="body" bottom="12" top="32" left="5%" right="5%">
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HSliderSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">

             height="6" verticalCenter="0"/>

</e:Skin>

	<e:Image id="img_identity" width="22" height="16" x="0" y="0" anchorOffsetY="0" anchorOffsetX="0" source="Identity_Unknown_png"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="OperationButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="36" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="14,4,75,27"
             source="OperationButton_png"
             source.down="OperationButtonDown_png"
             source.disabled="OperationButtonDisable_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="18"
             verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" text="确 定" fontFamily="SimHei" alpha="0.7" textColor="0xfff2f2"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ItemRendererSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" scale9Grid="1,3,8,8" alpha.disabled="0.5"
             source="button_up_png"
             source.down="button_down_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20" fontFamily="Tahoma"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" text="{data}" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="OperationButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="36" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" >

             source="OperationButton_png"
             source.down="OperationButtonDown_png"
             source.disabled="OperationButtonDisable_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="18"
             verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" text="确 定" fontFamily="SimHei" alpha="0.7" textColor="0xfff2f2"/>

</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="OverOperationButtonSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="40" minWidth="75" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing"  minHeight.up="36" width.up="75">
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" source="OverOperationButton_png" source.down="OverOperationButtonDown_png" source.disabled="OverOperationButtonDisable_png" scale9Grid="28,4,29,27"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="18"
             verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" text="结束" fontFamily="SimHei" alpha="0.88" textColor="0xffffff" alpha.up="0.7" textColor.up="0xfff2f2"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="OperationAreaSkin" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*"  minHeight="36" minWidth="942">
	<e:Button id="btn_ok" label="确 定" left="346" bottom="0" skinName="OperationButtonSkin" locked="true"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_cancel" label="取 消" left="531" bottom="0" skinName="OperationButtonSkin" locked="true"/>
	<e:Button id="btn_over" label="结束" x="679.97" skinName="OverOperationButtonSkin" bottom="0" locked="true"/>
	<e:Group width="374" height="100%" y="0" horizontalCenter="0" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Button id="btn_heart" label="" skinName="OperationButtonSkin" x="0" y="0" icon="SuitButton_Heart_png" anchorOffsetX="0" width="86" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Button id="btn_diamond" label="" skinName="OperationButtonSkin" x="96" y="0" icon="SuitButton_Diamond_png" width="86" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Button id="btn_spade" label="" skinName="OperationButtonSkin" x="192" y="0" icon="SuitButton_Spade_png" width="86" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
		<e:Button id="btn_club" label="" skinName="OperationButtonSkin" x="288" y="0" icon="SuitButton_Club_png" width="86" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="SelfGameAreaSkin" width="1136" height="118" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*" >
	<e:Image width="997" height="94" source="SelfHandBG_png" fillMode="scale" left="0" bottom="0"/>
	<ns1:SelfGeneralArea id="generalArea" width="191" height="118" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" right="0" bottom="0" skinName="SelfGeneralAreaSkin"/>
	<e:Image id="img_phase" width="160" height="17" x="50" y="8" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" source="SelfPlayPhase_png"/>
	<e:Scroller width="762" height="94" x="164" y="19" anchorOffsetX="0" scrollPolicyH="auto" scrollPolicyV="off" skinName="skins.ScrollerSkin">
		<e:List id="list_handCards" x="0" y="0" allowMultipleSelection="true" itemRenderer="CardRenderer" useVirtualLayout="false">
		<e:layout>
			<e:HorizontalLayout gap="2" paddingTop="11" paddingBottom="1" paddingLeft="2" paddingRight="0"/>
		</e:layout>
		</e:List>
